headline: Constellation Brands Stock Slumps on Mexico Tariff Threat. Why the Damage Might Be Overblown.
summary: If the beer distributor raises prices because of new tariffs, brands like Corona and Modelo might become less attractive than U.S. brands like Bud Light.
